comment._content: William Squire Kenyon , R-IA: bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=K000129 John Downey Works, R-CA: bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=W000743 not sure about Cummings, can't find a listing for a Senator by that name or a Congressman who was in office in 1912.
